ttl.name: REAR NO. 1 SEAT ASSEMBLY (for RH Side)

atten2.ptxt: Wear protective gloves. Sharp areas on the seatback frame and seat cushion frame may injure your hands.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR PROTECTOR PIPE
INSTALL REAR SEAT LOCK ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Using a T40 "torx" socket, install the lock with the "torx" bolt.
Install the support spring.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT LOCK ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the lock with the 2 nuts.
Install the E-ring, washer and support spring as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 1 FOLD SEAT STOPPER BAND ASSEMBLY
INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEAT CUSHION COVER RH

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Using hog ring pliers, install the seat cushion cover to the seat cushion pad with 9 new hog rings.
Install the seat cushion cover (with pad) to the seat cushion frame.

atten4.ptxt: Make sure that the seat stopper band is not inside the seat cushion cover.

s2.ptxt: Pass the 2 lap type belts through the hole in the seat cushion cover (with pad). Then install the 2 lap type belts to the seat cushion frame with the 2 bolts.
Close the zippers.
Using hog ring pliers, install 5 new hog rings.
Close the fastening tape.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEAT CUSHION ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Using a T40 "torx" socket, install the 2 seat tracks to the seat cushion with the 2 "torx" bolts.
Install the seat track adjusting handle.
Lift up the seat track adjusting handle and move the seat track to the foremost position.
Using a T40 "torx" socket, install the 4 "torx" bolts on the rear side of the seat track.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT LOCK CONTROL CABLE RH

s2.ptxt: Install the control cables as shown in the illustration.
Install the E-ring and 2 washers.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT HINGE ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Install the hinge with the 2 nuts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT HINGE ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the hinge with the 2 nuts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 1 SEAT LEG LINK

s2.ptxt: Install the leg link with the 4 plates and 2 E-rings.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEAT TRACK LOWER RAIL PROTECTOR LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the claws to install the rail protector.
Install the screw.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEAT TRACK LOWER RAIL PROTECTOR RH

s2.ptxt: Attach the claws to install the rail protector.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT LOCK COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Pass the reclining release handle through the hole in the lock cover. Then install the lock cover with the 2 screws.
Fold the reclining release handle as shown in the illustration. Then install the 2 lock release buttons.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT LOCK INNER COVER LH
INSTALL REAR SEAT LOCK OUTER COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the lock cover.
Install the screw.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the seat belt with the bolt.

atten3.ptxt: Do not overlap the anchor part of the seat belt and protruding parts of the seat.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT ARMREST ARM LH (w/ Center Armrest)

s2.ptxt: Install the arm with the nut.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT ARMREST ARM RH (w/ Center Armrest)

s2.ptxt: Install the arm with the nut.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEATBACK COVER RH

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Using hog ring pliers, install the seatback cover to the seatback pad with 2 new hog rings.
Install the seatback cover (with pad) to the seatback frame.
Attach the 4 claws to install the 2 headrest supports.
w/ Center Armrest:
Using hog ring pliers, install 10 new hog rings.
w/ Center Armrest:
Install the armrest with the 2 bushes and 2 bolts.
Close the zipper and attach the hooks.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEATBACK ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the seatback with the 4 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEAT RECLINING COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the reclining cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEAT RECLINING COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the reclining cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RECLINING ADJUSTER RELEASE HANDLE RH

s2.ptxt: Install the release handle with the screw.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT HEADREST ASSEMBLY
